import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { savePaymentMethod } from '../../../Actions/CartActions'; import CheckoutSteps from '../../checkoutSeteps/CheckoutSteps' export default function PaymentMethodScreen() { const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal'); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)); props.history.push('/placeorder'); } return (
